content:
This is a nice page: https://openapi.tools/

I don't know if anyone wants to produce a nice page like that for FHIR?
@nicola (RIO/SS) I recall that you once had a similar idea, did you start working on it?
Yes, Alex. in ruby world - https://www.ruby-toolbox.com/ maintained for decade. We can start from other good practice - awesome list - https://github.com/fhir-fuel/awesome-FHIR/blob/master/README.md
and after turn it into toolbox static site
